Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It's designed to meet the highest standards and provide exceptional value. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering all these factors, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we believe it brings to its users. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
